items.sentence: Tom is afraid that he might do something he'll regret.
Tom said that he didn't want to sleep in the basement.
I don't think that Tom knows what Mary did last night.
I don't think that Tom knows that Mary isn't Canadian.
You should read books like the one Tom is reading now.
Make sure that you turn off the lights when you leave.
Make sure that you turn the lights off when you leave.
This is something that we'll always have to deal with.
I believe Tom had something to do with the kidnapping.
About how many kilometers per liter does this car get?
